gmailEventObject.description: The Gmail event object is the portion of the overall event object that carries information about a user's Gmail messages. It's only present in an event object if the host application is Gmail.

messageId.description: The ID of the currently open Gmail message.

threadId.description: The currently open Gmail thread ID.

accessToken.description: The Gmail-specific access token. You can use this token with the "X-Goog-Gmail-Access-Token" HTTP header to grant your add-on temporary access to a user's currently open Gmail message or let your add-on compose new drafts.

toRecipients.description: The list of "To:" recipient email addresses currently included in a draft the add-on is composing

ccRecipients.description: The list of "CC:" recipient email addresses currently included in a draft the add-on is composing

bccRecipients.description: The list of "BCC:" recipient email addresses currently included in a draft the add-on is composing
